import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-about', templateUrl: './about.component.html', styleUrls: ['./about.component.css'] }) export class AboutComponent { }

About This Application

This is a simple yet efficient Inventory Management System designed to help users manage products seamlessly. It allows users to view, add, edit, and delete products efficiently.

Key Features:

  • üì¶ Product Management: Add, edit, and delete products with ease.
  • üîç Search & Filter: Quickly find products using the built-in search functionality.
  • üõ° Secure Authentication: User authentication with login and registration.
  • üìä Real-Time Data: Updates product information dynamically.
  • ‚ö° Single Page Application (SPA): Smooth and fast user experience using Angular.

Technology Stack:

  • üÖ∞Ô∏è Angular: Front-end framework for building a dynamic user interface.
  • üõ†Ô∏è JSON Server: Mock back-end to store product data.
  • üé® CSS & Tailwind: Responsive and modern UI design.

How It Works:

  1. 1Ô∏è‚É£ Users sign in or register for an account.
  2. 2Ô∏è‚É£ They can browse the inventory of available products.
  3. 3Ô∏è‚É£ Users can add new products, edit existing ones, or remove them.
  4. 4Ô∏è‚É£ The system ensures secure authentication and smooth navigation.

Future Enhancements:

We plan to integrate a **real database (MongoDB or Firebase)**, improve authentication with **JWT security**, and add **analytics dashboards** for tracking inventory performance.
